评论概述: Elegant and Perfect to Feel Beautiful
评论详情: This Grace Karin dress is absolutely stunning and perfect for wearing for dressy occasions! The elegance of the design strikes the perfect balance between classy and understated, making it ideal for such a special occasion. It’s beautifully crafted, with high-quality materials and attention to detail that give it a polished, sophisticated look.  The fit is spot on. I followed the measurement guide provided, and the dress fit exactly as expected.  The fabric feels luxurious, and the design details add a subtle touch of glamour which makes you feel confident and stylish. I received so many compliments throughout the day!  If you’re looking for a dress that’s both elegant and affordable, this is an excellent choice. It’s a versatile piece that works perfectly for formal occasions and church. Highly recommend it!

This is a really pretty purple dress and works for my curves, but I’m going to exchange for exact same dress hoping it doesn’t have multiple snags on it. Obviously it cheaply made, but it looks very classy and is made for curvy, which is great because it doesn’t have a belt and I need it to come in at the waist so I don’t look like a fig. I’m 5’2” and 155 and bought a 14. Fit perfectly with a little extra room for movement. I feel it’s true to US sizing for women. If you’re a shorty like me, the dress falls just below the knees. I do recommend—looks expensive and the purple is pretty, although not quite as vivid as pictured.

评论概述: Absolutely loved this dress which I wore to my grandson’s wedding in Las Vegas!
评论详情: It was really comfortable even outside in the 112 degree temperature.  I liked that the sheer fabric sleeves covered my crepey upper arms.  The only negative was that it arrived with set in wrinkles so I put through a delicate rinse cycle & two cycles in my steam cycle dryer.  I then still had to iron it by using two irons, one for steaming it & the other for pressing it.  Could all have been avoided if it had been packed loosely in a box instead of a vacuum sucking plastic bag. But my effort was worth it!  I love the dress💞

I bought this to be my mother of the bride dress for my son‘s wedding in May. I had tried on over a dozen dresses, but I kept this one because I liked the way the sleeves covered my mature upper arms, and the cut of the bodice was the least unflattering to my physique. However, after only wearing it for about 12 hours, when I took it off I found there were many snags in the fabric, on the front and the back. Fortunately, I was able to use a small hook and pull most of them through to the inside so I should be able to wear it again. But if the snags had been worse and developed a hole, it would’ve been a one time wearing. If you’re gonna be partying hard or in a large crowd where you might have more objects to be rubbing up against, this may not be the dress for you.  Otherwise, I loved the dress.
